notes.text:
Selected Product: 1-Year MCAN Discover Alt

Clients looking to consolidate debts.

Income: 
B1 Travis - income confirmed per LOE
B2 Amita - BFS accountant, income calculated per the average of her 2023/2024 T1 Generals
B3 Ravindra - average of 2023/2024 T1 Generals

Travis' wife - not coming on title, but $1400/m being used as contributory income (she earns higher, as confirmed by her paystub). 

Amita's mom also lives with them and pays $750/m ( not using this to debt service)    True ratios are much lower. 

Credit Story: Solid repayment history, however, balances have accrued over the last few years due to family expenses, weddings, emergencies, etc. Looking to clear off as much of Travis' debts as possible to save him $1700/m. His parents will clear their debts on their own as they are BFS and have the capability to increase their income.

Spoke with Harriet prior to submission. Please contact sarah@bluepearlmortgage.ca for any questions, thanks!

You have spoke with my mom about this, i have debt that i racked up over the years. My parents are on title but they want to come off and i go solo but use any additional money to pay off debt. I can add my wife on title to bump me up for approval if needed.

• online consent taken on july 29- 2025
